bug.summary: waterfall & bar plot broken with matplotlib>=3.3.0
bug.description:
tested on and . with plots work well. to reproduce: have and run this <denchmark-link:https://github.com/slundberg/shap/blob/master/notebooks/general/Explainable%20AI%20with%20Shapley%20Values.ipynb>sample notebook</denchmark-link> . broken plot samples: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/3153534/91641204-67093d80-ea55-11ea-8af5-59a300c7e9b7.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/3153534/91641208-6b355b00-ea55-11ea-8ac5-3c12f342f403.png></denchmark-link>

comments.comment: Thanks! That explains why some others had seen those layout issues.

The issue turned out to be that matplotlib started "merging" tick marks that we at the same location in 3.3. And this broke a lot of the overlays we were using to draw multi-color labels. It is now fixed :) (by adding 1e-8 to the second copy of the tick marks)
Thanks for your quick response and the fix! :)
